page.title: 17CONCLUSION, KIRKBY UNDERWOOD
page.content:
This present,1985,study of the 4x3 km. square centred on Kirkby Underwood as part of the nationwide "Domesday Project" has been undertaken by the members of Kirkby Underwood Women's Institute.
The following ladies were largely responsible for the investigation: Mrs.S.Brede,Mrs.S.Cassidy,Mrs.C.Flynn, Miss E. Giles, Mrs.F. Plummer, Mrs.M. Wright, Mrs.J. Wright and Mrs.H. Wyer.
The four selected photographs were taken by Mr. and Mrs. E. Brede.
The use of the BBC microcomputer, technical advice and information was provided by Mr.R. Wright, Headteacher of Bourne County Primary School.
